About

Masudur Rahman

Full Stack Web Developer

Hi there,

I am Masudur Rahman, full stack Web Developer and Designer, if you want to do an web application, I can serve for you. With the most intelligency and more powerfull softwere will build for you.
My code is full fresh hand-code, no CMS. As the tools ReactJs, SCSS, Tailwind, Bootstrap, JQuery, TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML and CSS for frontend services and the backend services PHP, NodeJs, ExpressJs, SQL and My SQL. For relationship two side Ajax, Json and Xml. For Dersigning perpose Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Figma and Canva.
I have more than two year experience for this services. I will have a promise for good experience for your services. Thank you for reading, Have a nice day!
Masudur Rahman
Full Stack Web Developer

Vission

An E-commerse Website that will be easy to load, Optimum Design for increasement of selling, Good user experience. Easy to use for all End users. A good experience to upload the product. Wonderfull Dashboard and control all contents from dashboard or control page.

Mission

Good Experience in work, suitable work experience, Client shetisfection is first enhancement to work. enable to allwork experience. all type of website can I buil up. Increasement of the business.

Services

Frontend Services

  • ➲Beautiful design and dynamic land page
  • ➲Modern framework were used in project
  • ➲As you need, ReactJs or tailwind CSS
  • ➲Uses Bootstrap or JQuery for small project
  • ➲As you need TypeScrip for programing
  • ➲Good Experience to all work and Application

Backend Services

  • ➲Modern Technology uses in Server
  • ➲As the needed PHP, NodeJs or ExpressJs
  • ➲As the Database tools SQL and My SQL
  • ➲API Handling in Uses as the need as
  • ➲Using Ajax, xml or json to data store
  • ➲Super Security system in backend data

Full Stack Services

  • ➲Eye catching Dersigning in your site
  • ➲As need as Frontend technology used
  • ➲PHP or NodeJs in backend server building
  • ➲Most uses database uses in server
  • ➲Full dynamic website in control
  • ➲Ausome website to uses in all sites
